document.full_text: calls for the removal of ousted president hosni mubarak's name and likeness from many public institutions have shed light on the cult of personality he created during his tenure.
document.title: hosni mubarak's shadow still falls over egypt
lines_and_colors: calls for the removal of ousted president hosni mubarak's name and likeness from many public institutions have shed light on the cult of personality he created during his tenure.
